max_car_parking_space.comment: maximum car parking spaces, -1 for infinite

max_motorcycle_parking_space.comment: maximum motorcycle parking spaces, -1 for infinite

max_bicycle_parked_in_a_motorcycle_space.comment: maximum bicycles parked in one motorcycle space

mean.comment: mean value of passenger probability per hour (in 24h)

std.comment: standard deviation of passenger probability per hour (in 24h)

passenger_enter_rate.comment: passenger enter to the station rate per hour (in 24h)(range between 0 and 1)

car.comment: probability of car parking and leaving per hour (in 24h)(range between 0 and 1 and sum of car, motorcycle, bicycle parking (leaving) probabilities should less than 1)

motorcycle.comment: probability of motorcycle parking and leaving per hour (in 24h)(range between 0 and 1 and sum of car, motorcycle, bicycle parking (leaving) probabilities should less than 1)

bicycle.comment: probability of bicycle parking and leaving per hour (in 24h)(range between 0 and 1 and sum of car, motorcycle, bicycle parking (leaving) probabilities should less than 1)
